trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that represents a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor"></xref> type that can be implemented in order to monitor changes to cache entries.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor> class provides abstract, read-only properties that can be implemented for monitoring cache entries.
This class is used when a cache implementation has to monitor changes to entries in its own cache.

For caches that are <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> cache implementations, an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor> type is returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.CreateCacheEntryChangeMonitor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.String%29> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor"></xref> class.
This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the base class.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor> class has a default constructor.
Gets a collection of cache keys that are monitored for changes.
The collection is typically set in the constructor of a derived <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor> type.
Gets a value that indicates the latest time (in UTC time) that the monitored cache entry was changed.

If multiple cache entries are being monitored for changes, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor.LastModified%2A> property returns the latest time a modification occurred in any of the cache entries.
The value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor.LastModified%2A> property is typically calculated during initialization of a derived class.
Gets the name of a region of the cache.
The value of this property typically indicates a particular region where changes are monitored in the cache.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor.RegionName%2A> property provides the option to configure change monitors so that they monitor cache entries only in a specific cache region.
The name of a region in the cache.
